snippet: Hostess Brands, the baking company known for sweet treats like Twinkies and Ding Dongs, filed for bankruptcy on Wednesday, just three years after emerging from an earlier restructuring process.
abstract: Hostess Brands, the baking company known for sweet treats like Twinkies and Ding Dongs, filed for bankruptcy on Wednesday, just three years after emerging from an earlier restructuring process.

headline.main: Hostess, Maker of Twinkies, Files for Bankruptcy
